alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Jones; Lyman; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 1:41PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Jones; Lyman; Stanley; Sully
